title: Epic: Phase 3 Development
body:
This epic tracks all work for Phase 3 of the project.

Goals:
- Complete core features
- Implement advanced functionality
- Ensure quality standards

title: Feature: User Authentication System
body:
Implement a complete user authentication system with:
- Login/logout
- Password reset
- Multi-factor authentication

title: Feature: Dashboard UI
body:
Create a dashboard interface for users:
- Overview statistics
- Quick actions
- Recent activity feed

title: Task: Implement login endpoint
body: Create POST /api/auth/login endpoint with proper validation and JWT token generation.

title: Task: Add password hashing
body: Implement bcrypt password hashing for secure credential storage.

title: Task: Design dashboard layout
body: Create responsive dashboard layout with grid system.

title: Task: Implement statistics widgets
body: Build reusable widget components for displaying statistics.

title: Bug: Login form validation error
body:
The login form doesn't properly validate email format before submission.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Enter invalid email
2. Click submit
3. No validation error shown
